forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. North northeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 75. Northeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. North northeast wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
